item.description:
As an early stage start-up, we're trying to take advantage of Cloud computing, specifically AWS to run our Data Center operation in a utility fashion.
we'd like to share our experience with other start-ups who have or are looking to deploy in the cloud / on AWS. We'll discuss the: good, bad & the ugly...
Also great opportunity to do some networking & have some pizza.

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services February Meetup
